noVendorFound: No vendor profile found. Please create a vendor profile to continue.

profile.title: Vendor Profile Created
profile.description: Your vendor profile has been successfully created and is now ready for setup.

templates.title: Create Product Templates
templates.description: Create templates for your products, activities or services. Templates define the basic structure of what you offer.

items.title: Generate Product Items
items.description: Convert your templates into bookable items by setting dates, times, and availability.

stripe.title: Connect Payment Processing
stripe.description: Set up your Stripe account to accept payments and manage your earnings securely.

approval.title: Final Approval
approval.description: Once all steps are completed, your profile will be reviewed for final approval.

title: Vendor Status Page
awaitingApproval: Your vendor profile setup is complete and is now awaiting final review. We'll notify you once approved.

errors.title: Error
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

submitted.title: Profile Submitted
submitted.description: Your vendor profile has been submitted successfully.

actionNeeded.title: Action Required
actionNeeded.description: Please address the following items to continue:

stripe.title: Stripe Connect Account Setup
stripe.description: Complete your Stripe account setup to enable payments and transactions.
stripe.exitedMessage: Stripe onboarding was exited. Would you like to resume?
